items.title: Introduction to Web and eCommerce User eXperience Design

visible_instructors.job_title: Internationally  recognized consultant, author, and  teacher
visible_instructors.name: Deborah J.
visible_instructors.title: Deborah J. Mayhew

items.headline: Get an overview of the What, Why and How of web and ecommerce user experience design and find out how to learn more.
objectives_summary: Understand the key elements of the design of a website user interface that will impact the User eXperience: usability, persuasion and graphic design
Understand why and how the quality of the User eXperience will directly impact the bottom-line of eCommerce websites
Acquire an overview of User eXperience that will provide context for other courses that provide more depth in certain topics

items.title: User Experience (UX) Fundamentals
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of UX (user experience) design and process.
objectives_summary: Describe what user experience design is and why it's important
Describe the principles of great user experience design
Describe the process you should follow to design a great user experience

items.title: User Experience Certification

visible_instructors.job_title: Author of 'Think Like a UX Researcher'
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David Travis

items.headline: An introduction to the BCS Foundation Certificate in UX
objectives_summary: Explain the purpose of the BCS Foundation Certificate in User Experience.
Decide if this is the right qualification for you.
Appreciate the range of topics that will come up in the examination.

items.title: Beyond Usability: Learn the User Research Toolkit
items.headline: A 60-minute introduction to a variety of user research methods
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of user research and how to get started doing the top study methods
Match the best user research methodology to a current product stage, question, or problem
Apply expert research techniques and tips

items.title: InVision Studio for UI Designers
items.headline: Interface Design and Prototyping all in one
objectives_summary: Learn all the Studio's tools
Practice on a real project
Create animations and microinteractions

items.title: Rapid Usability Research For UX Designers

visible_instructors.job_title: Research, Insight, Strategy, Results. Digital that delivers.
visible_instructors.name: Loop11
visible_instructors.title: Loop11 Loop11

items.headline: Start running research in less than 1 hour
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to define and create UX research objectives.
Understand the considerations and best practices for participant recruitment.
Understand how and why to create a prototype that is 'testable'.

items.title: Gamification - engage customers in your business! LITE.

visible_instructors.job_title: Wznieś swoje umiejętności na wyższy poziom!
visible_instructors.name: Infolia
visible_instructors.title: Infolia Business Academy

items.headline: Gamification: the hottest marketing trend - learn how to win new audiences and engage existing customers. Lite version.
objectives_summary: Learn what the gamification is

Methods and rules for engaging clients in gamification. How to encourage some behaviors and routines and make customers want to start their day by checking updates on your website, buy your products or drop by your café more often.
Products that advertise themselves: if you don't want to spend a small fortune on advertising, this is something to look into.

items.title: Design and Prototype an iOS8 Mobile App on Illustrator
items.headline: Create beautiful, high-fidelity iOS8 app prototypes with interactions and transitions. No coding skills required.
objectives_summary: Know how to create iPhone 6 screens and assets
Prototype complex flows easily
Simulate iOS8 transitions and interactions

items.title: User Experience (UX) Strategy Fundamentals
items.headline: A short course that introduces you to the principles and processes of UX Strategy work in an organization
objectives_summary: Principles and processes of UX Strategy work in an organization

items.title: User Experience - Applied Research and Design
items.headline: Learn UX. Gain a deep understanding of the UX process used to create professional products.
objectives_summary: learn what the tasks and responsibilities of a UX designer are
learn about the UX research process
learn how to conduct professional research for a UX project

items.title: Adobe Xd 2021 Basics - UI / UX Design Course
items.headline: Learn all the basics of Adobe Xd 2021
objectives_summary: Adobe Xd
Become a UI Designer
Layer management

items.title: UX: The Evidence-Based Redesign
items.headline: Learn the foolproof system for knowing what users want so you can improve any website
objectives_summary: An evidence-based framework you can apply for making website improvements
Go beyond metrics and understand why your website users act the way they do
Tips and advice on how to interpret different data and run your own tests

items.title: Python Tkinter for making Graphical User Interface

visible_instructors.job_title: Aspiring Machine Learning Engineer and Pythonista
visible_instructors.name: Aryan
visible_instructors.title: Aryan Dawer

items.headline: BEST COURSE FOR LEARNING TKINTER
objectives_summary: This is a project inclusive course for those who have just learnt basic python and want to explore the various libraries. Tkinter is the best library to make GUIs in python. This course will give you the necessary skills to make your own python GUIs(desktop apps) and even commercialize them

items.title: Learn Figma for UI UX Design (with a Design Project)
items.headline: Learn the Figma's Essentials for UI/UX Design from a Sr. Designer with 8+ Years of Experience
objectives_summary: Figma Basic & Advanced principles
How to Use Icon Libraries for UI Design
Pro Design Workflows

items.title: UX Methods Fundamentals
items.headline: A short course that introduces you to 5 different methods and processes for doing User Experience work
objectives_summary: The differences between five UX methods and processes
Core concepts and principles for Agile UX, Lean UX, Design Thinking, User Centered Design, and the Behavioral Design Process
Advantages and disadvantages for each method

items.title: Get Started in UI/UX Design
items.headline: Learn the Essentials of UI UX Design from a Sr. Designer with 8+ Years of Experience
objectives_summary: UI/UX Design principles
UI UX Essential Vocabulary
UX Design with Sketch App
